TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {131878=28 July 2015, 204075=Uttam Galva is in the Steel - GP & GC Sheets sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 503.60 crore. The company management includes Rajinder Miglani - Non Executive Chairman, Anuj R Miglani - Managing Director, Ankit Miglani - Non Executive Director, Gursharan S Sawhney - Director - Finance & CFO, S G Tudekar - Director - Works, Swarna Prabha Sukumar - Director, O P Gahrotra - Independent Director, D L Rawal - Independent Director, S T Parikh - Independent Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 513216 and the NSE with an NSE Code of UTTAMSTL. Its Registered office is at 69, Uttam House, P Dmello Road, Mumbai,Maharashtra - 400009. Their Registrars are Universal Capital Securities Pvt. Ltd., 202768=Zensar Technologies Recommended on Mar 24th 2015, 133096=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 132389=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut}
